body.p: This procedure updates the IP address, user name, password and/or port of the vCenter in the EON service if any of those values are changed. vCenter retains the same name which is provided at the time of creation of vCenter. The name of the vCenter can not be modified.

ol.li:
Execute the following command:eon resource-manager-update [--ip-address <RESOURCE_MANGER_IP_ADDR>] [--username <RESOURCE_MANGER_USERNAME>] [--password <RESOURCE_MANGER_PASSWORD>] [--port <RESOURCE_MANGER_PORT>] <RESOURCE_MANGER_ID>
Where:
Resource Manager IP address - the IP address of the vCenter server.
Resource Manager Username - the admin privilege username for the vCenter.
Resource Manager Password - the password for the above username.
Resource Manager Port - the vCenter server port. By default it is 443.
Resource Manager ID - the ID for the vCenter server
Sample Outputeon resource-manager-update --username root --password gone2far 2A6FC852-5F5E-4206-B6CC-C85E6B62A367 +-------------+--------------------------------------+ | Property | Value | +-------------+--------------------------------------+ | ID | 2A6FC852-5F5E-4206-B6CC-C85E6B62A367 | | IPv4Address | 10.1.200.17 | | Name | 10.1.200.17 | | Password | <SANITIZED> | | Port | 443 | | State | registered | | Type | vcenter | | Username | root | +-------------+--------------------------------------+
